title: LF 1 OR 2 MEMBERS TO JOIN CLASH TEAM
body:
Hi! I'm looking for 1-2 players who want to join my clash team BLP. The people who are currently in my team are ranked silver. I don't really mind how high or low your rank is. Midlane, ADC and Jungle have been taken already (leaving support and top). 

If you're interested, please reply to this message or add me on league to be invited (asap if possible). GLHF and see you on the rift!!

- cypher 
{{sticker:sg-ahri-2}}

NEW: 
MY TEAM IS NOW COMPLETE.

replies.body: I can adc/mid if any positions become availible
Hi there! Thank you for your interest but unfortunately, my team is now full. I hope to see you on the rift though!!
